ModMetaData.name: [ZEN] Gas Traps And Shells Retextured
ModMetaData.author: Poet
ModMetaData.description:
This retexture mod changes the graphics for the Gas Traps And Shells mod and the Chemshine Mortar Shells mod.
This mod DOES NOT alter the behavior or function of the modded items, therefore it's compatible with other mods that might change the original mod in other ways. You need the Gas Traps And Shells mod for this to work, obviously. This mod should be placed after the mods it modifies, or somewhere at the bottom / last on your modlist.
